content:
/>
VII.i.1.D.1.e
.
Handling Claims With Missing Claim Documents
Follow the failure-to-upload procedures in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 2.A.5
upon discovering that documents associated with a claim to add a dependent to a beneficiary’s award are not available in the beneficiary’s eFolder.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D - Dependency Claims Processed by the Rules-Based Processing System (RBPS)
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section D
